pullRequest.title: try reloading the IDE main page if the first attempts fail
pullRequest.bodyText:
Intent
Fixes #8270.
Approach
When the Desktop page fails to load, try to reload the page a couple times on the off-chance that the error occurred because the rsession was not quite ready yet.
QA Notes
Unfortunately still not sure how to reproduce consistently; will rely on community feedback.

commit.message: try reloading the IDE main page if the first attempts fail
static is redundant in anonymous namespace

nodes.bodyText: It feels like the problem here is that for some period of time the R session is refusing to accept connections. With this change, we will give up after trying for a total of 500ms, which feels like it might not be long enough. I think 5 retries is plenty but we might want to space them out more. How would you feel about trying this every 200ms instead (so we ultimately have a 1s grace period)?
